method.name: Action
method.tp:docstring: INTERNAL; not public API. Perform an action.

arg.name: connection
arg.tp:docstring: The connection for which this action was triggered.

arg.name: connection_properties
arg.tp:docstring: Properties of the connection, including service and path.

arg.name: device_properties
arg.tp:docstring: Properties of the device, including type, path, interface, and state.

arg.name: device_ip4_config
arg.tp:docstring: Properties of the device's IPv4 configuration.

arg.name: device_ip6_config
arg.tp:docstring: Properties of the device's IPv6 configuration.

arg.name: device_dhcp4_config
arg.tp:docstring: Properties of the device's DHCPv4 configuration.

arg.name: device_dhcp6_config
arg.tp:docstring: Properties of the device's DHCPv6 configuration.

arg.name: vpn_ip4_config
arg.tp:docstring: Properties of the VPN's IPv4 configuration.

arg.name: vpn_ip6_config
arg.tp:docstring: Properties of the VPN's IPv6 configuration.

arg.name: results
arg.tp:docstring: Results of dispatching operations. Each element of the returned array is a struct containing the path of an executed script (s), the result of running that script (u), and a description of the result (s).
